application.doc: Creating a file in the administration pages root

param.name: id
param.doc: The relative path in which the file is created. The top-level directory must be one of management, errors, oauth, snippets, or junction-root. For example, management/C.

method.name: POST
method.id: Creating a file in the administration pages root
method.doc: To create a file in the administration pages root with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the Administration Pages Root files resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Content-type:json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the new file

param.name: type
param.doc: The type of resource to create. In this case, it is "file".

param.name: contents
param.doc: Optional contents of the new file. If this parameter is not present, then an empty file is created.

param.name: id
param.doc: The name of the new resource.
